data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during El Andaluz cruise from Montevideo to Cádiz started at 1778-05-06
Ship: El Andaluz (Chambequín), Voyage: Montevideo - Cádiz, 1st Observer: Benito Antonio de Lira (Teniente De Navío)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
